content.detailedDescription:
Looking north, 5-6 objects were spotted dogfighting for approx. 10 minutes, around 8 minutes in a fireball shoots through the sky and joins in the dogfight. objects travel east


3 witnesses, possibly more
content.summary: Small lights dogfighting low to the ground, plus a fireball joins in

content.detailedDescription: I went outside just to smoke and saw what i thought was a large bright star or planet in the sky.  i was looking at it when i noticed that it had what looked like dim orbs shooting away from it and fading quickly.  i then noticed that the object was growing dimmer and then brighter, and at times would appear wider.  i moved out to the darker area of my driveway for a better look, when it appeared that something shot straight up from ground level to the bright object.  the best way to describe it was like a shooting star in reverse.  next, it moved a fairly good distance in my direction, and that scared me after the backwards shooting star beam-me-up looking thing i had just seen, so i quickly came in and watched it from the door.  soon it stopped again, so i went out again to look.  at this time i had a friend come to my house, and i asked her to look at it.  she noticed it's movement and change of shape as well.  we also noticed two planes that were flying in a large circle around where the object was located.  as far as i know it is still out there, and it is now 9:21.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a star or planet but it moved and has smaller objects coming in and away from it.

content.detailedDescription:
Pulled into gas station, girlfriend went into store. looked into sky and saw two glowing white objects heading toward lake huron. got out of truck and grapped my digital camera. snapped a couple pics with the flash on.
turned on the video mode and shot two clips. the objects were brighter than venus,wich was nearby. both objects were going same direction and about same alt. watched for about two minutes before objects faded out.
content.summary: Observed two ufo's at gas station

content.detailedDescription:
Pulled into gas station, looked up and saw two ufo's flying toward lake huron. made no sound, and were brighter than nearby venus. ufo's powered 
up and faded out. both were traveling the same direction and altitude.
witnessed by my girlfriend and her brother, and two people at the gas station. one was the clerk who came out of the store. stepped out of
truck and got my digital camera. took a few pics with the flash on, then
turned on the video mode. got two clips.
content.summary: Two ufo's spotted at gas station

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday august 12, 2007 my sister and i were traveling north on hwy 83. we were between north platte and valentine, nebraska. this is a familar route to us. we had passed through thedford and had planned to stop at a rest stop called ballard's marsh. a few miles before we arrived there, we noticed the car's dome lights going on and off.  it was broad daylight,timeline was around noon. we pulled into the rest area on the west side of the road and got back into the vehicle. we did not see any object. the transmission refused to go into gear.  luckily, the car was a hyundai sonata which has an alternate to the automatic transmission.  it is a semi-standard model.  we managed to get the vehicle into first gear and limped up onto the highway and babied it to valentine, nebraska where it quit completely. the other thing is a little yo-yo that was in the car with us began to activate spontaneously at strange times. the yo-yo produced lights and sounds when you would play with it but it was laying stationary in the car. this went on for months after. it had never done it previously. at this point we noticed that the cell phone which had been completely charged had lost all of its power. the phone resisted charging and actually took two attempts before holding a charge. the car
 had to be towed 200 miles to a dealership in north platte where they discovered an electric sensor had gone out. we could not help but realize that we had experienced some kind of phenomenon.  we do not think we had any missing time.
content.summary: Car electrical problems of unknown origin

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if this was a ufo or not, but neither myself nor the person i was with could come up with a reasonable explanation for what we saw so we classified this event as a ufo sighting.  

i walked outside to get my backpack from my car while my friend was out letting her dogs goto the bathroom.  i stood outside her finishing my cigarette, when i was staring at the stars (it was a pretty clear night).

i watched a plane fly over head towards the portland airport, port and starboard lights blinking, flying at a lower altitude, preparing to land at pdx... nothing abnormal there... then after that plane passed over head, a minute later i notice a really bright star travelling at quite a fast speed, and maybe a few hundred feet behind it another one followed.  at this point i called to her and said "hey, what do you think that is?" (she is a plane buff)

at first i thought maybe they were satellites or something, but my friend said that she knows what sats. look like as she used to sit out as a kid with her father and watch the satellites over heard.  she said satellites are much more dimmer than what we saw.  it was the brightest thing in the sky.

she ran into the house to grab her binoculars, and i continued to watch these lights as they quickly traveled across the sky.  as i watched, the first light started dimming, dimmed to the point where it just disappeared.  when she came out, she handed me the binoculars and before i could track it, she said the other light did the same thing.

there was no sound at all, and no other lights (no red or green lights), no blinking lights either.  it was hard to gauge how high it was but she said it appeared to be pretty high up (around 30,000 feet).

the next day after thinking about it, she rationalized that it was a military plane and the reason for the dimming light was the fov as it was passing us.  it kind of made sense to me, but why at that altitude would both aircraft (traveling at the same speed) have those very bright lights and no port/starboard lights?)

we talked it over for about 20 minutes on all the different possibilities, but nothing really seemed to be rational.
content.summary: Two objects fly over head, slowly dim and fade out

content.detailedDescription:
on sept 8 2009 at 9:30 pm a friend and i were outside star gazing and playing with a new green laser. after being outside for about 15-20 minutes i saw a grey/black object in the sky. it was the size of a mini van and it did not have any shape the edges feathered into nothing,it was like a blotch in the sky. there were no lights and it blocked out the stars when it floated by. it was right above the trees so i would guess pretty accurately it was 150ft high or less and 75-100 ft away.
   there was no sound and that was very unnerving because of the size and how close it was. it was about a quarter mile from interstate 5. my neighbor that was with me saw it when i pointed it out using my green laser  and that's where it got strange. when the laser hit the object it reflected off a rainbow of colors. there was enough light when it reflected colors to see a slight shape of what gave me the impression was the bottom. and that was it it went behind  some trees. my neighbor just walked home without saying a thing. the whole thing took about 6 seconds.
content.summary: Car sized grey mass floating above trees.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in my car, driving to meet friends at a pizza joint one night in april of '97. it was approximately between 2000 and 2100 hours. hale bopp had been visible in the sky for several nights by this time, however, this night was different. on our way to meet friends, we kept noticing orange lights glowing in the sky in a vertical line. these lights would glow briefly, then go out, then glow again at different intervals with no dicernable pattern. (we later heard that these were alleged "flares" that the "military were practicing" in the sky.) so we arrived at our destination and upon exiting our vehicle, something above us caught my eye. i looked up and saw this huge craft, triangular in shape with small orangish-red lights on the under side, (which also appeared to have the pattern similar to that of a computer chip or motherboard) moving very, very slowly through the sky, appearing to be just above the treetops directly above where we were standing. it literally flew over my son and i in an eastward direction. i didn't know what to think of it at first. i just stood there frozen and stared with my chin hitting the ground. my son saw it also, however he was more interested in getting inside to have pizza, as i continued to stand outside in the parking lot until it flew out of sight. what struck me as being so eerie was the fact that it was moving so slowly, right above me and that there was absolutely no sound or vibrations coming from the craft. one of my friends had actually come outside the door of the establishment to see what was taking me so long. she stood by the door at the railing yelling to me and then when i could no longer see this object, i walked up and told her what i had seen. we proceeded to go inside, eat pizza with friends and sing some kareoke songs, not bringing the issue up again at that time. upon leaving and later returning home, i told my spouse at the time about my experience. of course he thought i was crazy and i never really spoke much about it again. i have attempted to contact persons about this experience one other time, but never followed through with it until now. only because i saw your program on television, and thought maybe someone would take me seriously. i know what i saw and would stand by it no matter what; even if it resorted to taking a polygraph test.
content.summary: Was travelling eastward very slowly above treetops

content.detailedDescription:
At approx.3:20-3:25pm on sept.10th,2009,i saw from my dock in malabar,fl. a white light traveling at a high rate of speed over the barrier island,or close to it(melbourne beach area)then it stopped,backed up,went straight up then back down and continued heading south.(this occured approx.Over the south shores condominiums)i ran out to the end of my dock to get a better look and against a backround of dark clouds,i saw this object continue going south at a very high rate of speed.Before i lost sight of it,it appeared to shoot a beam of light towards the ground,but it only lasted for a split second,then i lost sight of it,still heading south.This object was at a very low altitude(just over the condos)
a note of interest....The space shuttle is due to land at kennedy space center tonight at 7:05pm.
sincerely;john h.Logue
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A bright light traveled s.At a very high rate of speed,stopping,backing up,going straight up,back down,then went south again.

content.detailedDescription: Was standing outside in my backyard at approx. 8:00 pm, smoking, staring at the stars as always, looking nw towards mt. shasta direction.  first noticed this huge bright star drop down from my left.  it kinda flashed, then started slowly moving nw low in the sky.  as i was watching it, another one dropped down from i believe my right side, did the same flash, and fell in behind the other on in the same course.  both were glowing very bright yellowish white, no pulsations, and not a sound at all.  i know they could not have been planes, as i live near the city airport, and all planes have strobes.  these were larger that any plane i've ever seen.  they were very low, probably as low as some of the planes passing over, but the size of them dwarfed anything else i've seen in the sky here.  i wanted to go get my camera, but was afraid they would be gone, so i kept watching them move their straight course nw. slowly, the second one following the first by approximately 30-45 seconds.  they never turned, or made any sound.  i just kept watching them until they disappeared from my view due to trees in the distance.  i got a great view for about 3-4 minutes.  i was so excited, as my first reaction was that it was 09-09-09, and they were headed towards mt. shasta, where the om crystal was to be activated that day.  i am certain they were not anything from this world, i just kept feeling wonder, and love feelings from seeing them.
content.summary: Saw 2 huge starlike objects drop from sky-then slowly move nw

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:10 pm on september 9, 2009 i went to the backyard with a friends at his residence to light the bbq. i noticed what looked like a large satellite flying from sw to ne at a very moderate, absolutely silent speed about four to six hundred yards in the black sky. it was 100 times brighter than any star in the sky that was coming out at that time. i watched this unknown object fly and veer towards the ne direction, as a second one catches my eye about one minute behind it, traveling identically as the first one. as the first one got in the distance a little ways exactly in the ne direction, it just vanished, i then mentioned that if the second one does the same thing, i thought that would be strange. so i focused on this second object, like deja vu flying in the same quiet constant path approach the same exact spot as the first one and just vanish. my friend nor i can explain what we saw.

br
content.summary: Two large bright star like spheres traveling in train pattern from sw to ne and then dissappear

content.detailedDescription: El se���or le tomolas fotos a su familia, sin inmaginarse que las camaras captarian un objeto volador .
content.summary: Playas teleñas en honduras

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a metallic yellowish-white orb- or lemon- shaped object in the sky moving quite fast, on its own speed (not blown by the wind). after looking at it for like 4 seconds, i quickly aimed at it and took a photo (i had my camera ready at the time). i know for sure i did not imagine it because during the whole time i was looking at it, i kept asking myself if it was real. the timestamp on the photo is 11.41 am. my camera used is a canon powershot a570. i did not retouch or doctor the photo in any way. you can see the ufo around the center of the photo, zoom in and sharpen to see it clearer.

1. i was looking for chemtrails in the sky to photograph, in the driveway at the house where i live. there were several passing planes.

2. noticed it because it was moving.

3. when i first noticed it i didn't know what to make of it. it was glinting in the sky and sailing smoothly across the sky. it looked like it could be some kind of toy?

4. (see above)

5. looked at it for around 4-5 seconds, and kept questioning myself if it was real (no doubt). was going to ignore it but decided to take the photo anyway. after the event i realized that this was not a normal object to be seeing in the sky, and i realized that i might've just seen a ufo, the first time in my life, despite only hearing stories about ufos. my pulse started racing and i went inside to check the photo on my laptop. 

6. lost sight of it after taking the photo, because i guess by that time it traveled away and i couldn't pinpoint it any more.
content.summary: Metallic yellowish-white orb- or lemon- shaped object in the sky moving quite fast.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i walked down to the beach at the rosy mound natural area just a couple miles south of grand haven mi to watch the sunset.The sun set around 2030 (8:30). we decided to stay a while longer to see the stars come out. after about an hour or so of talking and looking at the stars i noticed that there was an unusually bright light out over lake michigan going west to east. at first i thought it was a plane with its landing lights on coming thru the clouds.

then i realized that there were no clouds in that direction. as it flew closer i asked my friend if she saw what i saw. she confirmed that she also saw it and asked me what it was. i told her i had no idea. it had no green or red marker lights to distinguish it as a commercial jet nor did it have a strobe light.  it was just a bright white light with a unusual aura surrounding it.
it gave me chills and the hair on my arms stood straight up as it got closer.
i called my mom who lives a few miles away and told her what i was seeing and to ask if she could see it also. she could not due to the area she lives in being a wooded area.

it was flying on a straight path. it almost looked like it was speeding up and then slowing down then speeding up again. as it neared the shore line i noticed another light  following about 10 to 15 seconds behind the first one. this object was emitting the same color light but did not have the unusual aura surrounding it.Both lights made no noise as they flew by which made it all the more creepy. as they crossed over land and flew farther east the lights eventually went out of site. after they were out of site we stayed there for another hour or so to see if they would come back or see if more would follow but nothing else was seen.
content.summary: Two ufo's flying over lake michigan.

content.detailedDescription:
Our friend was over.  she was leaving after stoping by to see our new puppy.
 i was looking up into the sky. like i usually do on a clear night.  i noticed a big ..Bright starlike object that blinked out. 

 the blinking caught my eye, then i was looking in direction where it was , when it blinked on again.  but now a blue light.
like neon blue. also starlike but alot closer.

 it was slowly moving. when i started to tell the two people that were with me. 
 they saw it too. it moved quicker , with no lights blinking 
only a blue neon type.    it moved across the entire sky in 3 minutes...

no noise.    it was quiet and we also live in the country..No other sounds
no blinking airplane lights either.

just a neon light.    my fiancee said there was another way ahead of it.."which i didnt see  bad eyesite or was too small for me"  she has better vision though.

big blue..  it was huge not like a lil dot..But rather large it had shape...Like a orb or star i would say.



it finally was out of my site cause it traveled the entire night sky..


my friend amy.. kept repeating its has no noise  ...And its not no plane.


fiancee thought maybe expermental craft.     but we all agree it wasnt a plane or a jet. helicopter, military or anything we ever seen before. 
including drones.... we have them locally because of ft drum and canada border for patroling. 

this was no wings  no body of any sorts....

just a big blue light.
content.summary: Blue light ,no flashing. big.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:

it has taken me 25 years to write this down in its entirety and share it with any one else.��� please forgive me if i ramble.��� 

i was sixteen years old.��� i had been up talking to a friend of mine on the phone and decided to go to bed.��� my mother and step-father and younger sister were already in bed asleep.��� we lived in a modest size single level rancher in tennessee. i went to sleep and was woken up at 12:34 (yes, i remember the exact time) by a painfully bright light outside of my window.��� i remember thinking to myself, "oh great, drew (a boyfriend of mine at the time) has wrecked his stupid car in the yard...I'm gonna get in so much trouble"...So i got up out of bed to go see what was going on.��� i pulled my hair back because it was just a mess and quietly opened my bedroom door.��� it was an old house and the floorboards creaked, doors popped, etc...So i had to be particularly cautious getting outside.��� i put my hand over the keys in the lock so they wouldn't make any noise when i turned them, and stepped out onto the back porch.��� the light was so bright it looked like daylight outside but i knew it wasn't.��� i opened the back door on the porch and started to step out onto the steps....But instead....I started rising up...Very quickly...I was shocked...At first i couldn't understand what was going on...I looked down and could see my house and street getting smaller...I could feel the wind around me but (even though it was february) i wasn't cold. i also realized that for whatever reason, i was not scared. i saw my high school....Everything.....Then i realized i was over a nearby park....And looked up.��� there was an array of three lights tightly together, almost like stars, that i began ascending toward.��� the lights "opened" into a triangular shape and i seemed to pass through that interior space.

i was in a room of sorts...It was a huge room.��� it was filled with people.��� humans. i could see....Hundreds of them it seemed.��� they weren't afraid either.��� we all stood in lines and there were other people that seemed to be asking each one of the humans a question.��� just one question.��� i could hear voices responding....I knew my turn would be soon and i knew no one knew where i was.��� i saw, what i thought was a telephone laying on a shelf and stepped out of line and went to call my friend chris to tell him what was happening because i knew he would call my mom, and my other friends right away.��� a small woman, older looking than anyone i have ever seen before, came over to me and gently put her hand over mine and said i should "put that down" because "it wasn't what i thought it was".��� she was kind and gentle and led me back to my line. it was my turn at that moment.��� they asked me my question...I remember responding...Then suddenly i felt like i was being sucked back down fast.....And was back in my room.��� where i fell on my bed and went into a very deep sleep.��� i never said a word about what happened to anyone....I knew that they would say i was crazy or something.��� so i kept it to myself.

i have tried for 25 years to remember what my question was, what my answer was....And i can't ever seem to recall.��� i wouldn't even be writing now, if more had not happened to me in more recent history.

when my daughter was 7 (i was 29) my second husband and i had a small apartment in an extremely rural area of tennessee that where he and i and my two children lived.��� it was attached to his sister's main house and was over a work shop.��� i was woken up, at 12:34 am...Yes, i looked...And that is exactly the time it was...Again, by a tremendous bright light shining in my second story apartment window.��� i tried to wake up my husband but i could not get him to rouse.��� i heard the door to our apartment open...I heard footsteps coming up to our living area from the workshop....I got up to see what was happening....As i came out of my bedroom, i heard the footsteps reach the top.��� i should have been looking at someone/thing...But there was nothing.��� there were two or three large skylights in the apartment and i could clearly see the entire room. after a second or two of silence...I heard the steps go right in front of me, pass me and head toward my daughter's room.��� my eyes kept straining to see what they should be seeing...But i never "saw" anyone.��� i saw her door open...I ran...Fast....Through her door and into her room and said out loud..."you stay away from my daughter!".��� the light blinked out instantly.��� i was left standing there shaking and still seeing "blue spots" from the light.��� for the record...My daughter was not home that night...She had decided to spend the night with a friend of hers.��� her room was empty.������ the next morning, i went down to my sister-in-law's house for coffee...And casually asked her if her son had gotten home late that evening.��� she said no, he had been home all night.��� she asked me why, so i mentioned that i thought maybe someone had headlights or something and was trying to play a joke on me...And told her about hearing the footsteps.....She laughed...Then said, "oh! you saw the angels too!".��� i was numb.��� i asked her what she meant....And she told me that she had a visit from something she decided was an "angel" that night around midnight....And that she has had those visits before.��� i excused myself from the conversation....I was feeling more than faint.��� it was the first time i had ever had anyone else verify an experience for me....It left me quite shaken.

many years have passed.��� i am now 41. ��� i no longer live in tennessee.��� i live in maryland.��� i have only told two other people about this...My mother...And my husband.��� i have never breathed a word of it to my children or anyone else.��� 

a couple of months ago, my youngest child, who is 6, got up one morning and asked me what the bright light outside of his window was during the night.������ he said it was so bright it woke him up.��� my husband and i are exceptionally anxious...This time i didn't wake up....I really don't know what else to do.��� we deadbolt our doors and make sure our home is as secure as possible.��� but, i am not convinced there is really anything i can do to protect him. ��� i don't even know for sure there is anything to protect him from...��� i have a couple of loose theories but nothing that really adds up...I just really feel...Alone.��� my experiences don't seem to be like others.

i have read so many of these commercialized experiences of being abducted, etc.��� i do know several things for facts...1) i was not dreaming..Nor was i suffering from "sleep paralysis" at any point.��� 2)��� this has apparently been going on for some time now....3) i am not crazy��� 4) no "experiments" have been done on me that i am aware of, 5) i have no "traumatic" memory of anything bad happening to me whatsoever, 6) there were no little gray people with big black eyes (although the woman that told me to put the item down was shorter than me and seemed extremely old...), and 7) i was not the only human being on that ....Ship?��� i know other people have had this experience...I saw them having it....

i am just scared now...And i don't even know of what.��� i am sure you must get a million messages like this a day.��� i thank you for your time and if you do not have any answers, i understand.��� i don't have any either.��� i just desperately needed to tell someone about this... just...In case.
content.summary: Repeated unknown events

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter were out in the back garden looking at the stars we often do this on a clear night we went outside about 8.30 pm saw a couple of shooting stars and satalites, at 9pm i noticed coming from the south a flashing red light it was comming towards us,i knew it couldnt be a plane because they just dont flash just red, as it got nearer we could see there was a red light on each corner and a flashing / pulsating red light in the middle underneath,it was triangle in shape, the sky was quite clear only a very small amount of cloud, and this object was high up, did not have any sound, as it came vertually above us it then turned and headed north east towards the sea thats wen we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Triangle red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back garden last night for some fresh air. now i have seen strange glowing lights before out in my garden so because my girlfriend was out thought id sit outside for a bit. after about 20mins or so i saw 4 red lights in a square formation moving quite quickly in the distance. they went out of view so i ran through my house to the front and onto the street and saw one of them move away fromt he formation and move quickly in another dorection while the remaining 3 lights vanished into the distance. i was amazed with this sitting because it was such a clear night and the way they throbbed was amazing! to be honest, im getting kinda used to seeing these things. me and my girlfriend have witnessed them 3 times this year, including 2 orange lights dancing around each other.

i tried to take video (which is why i know the exact time of the event) but you cant see anything. all you see is me running through the house going "omg!" lol.

an amazing sighting i thought i should report to see if any one can shed any light on it.

thanks
content.summary: Red throbing lights in square formation

content.detailedDescription:
My 12 year old daughter went to check the mail box and as she walked outside our house she witnessed floating above our street a round object not too far in the distance. she quickly grabed her cell phone in her pocket and snapped off two photos.

this happened on a school day approximately around may 2009 around 430 to 530 pm. sorry, i do not remember the exact dates.

what is interesting is she managed to capture the object as it tilted and moved off. you can see the landmarks of the houses and the trees to get a distance measurement and size approximation of the object.


she was very excited when she showed me the pictures.  i think the whole event lasted only for a few seconds

look at the second attached photo first the object should be seen stationary entitled ufo jpg.
 
the other photo entitled ufo 1.Bmp should be the object moving away from the camera over the trees. i had a little difficulty downloading the images
if you do clean them up i would like to see them, please

i hope thiis is helpful to your investigations
content.summary: Round squart object flat on bottom with thicker midsection and tapering top

content.detailedDescription:
Date and time of observation: monday, sept. 7, 2009, 9:05 pm.

viewing location: san jose, california

direction observed: looking towards the southwest

elevation of object: about 30 degrees

distance of object: estimate very high altitude or low earth orbit

description of object: bright red light, not quite steady and slightly unstable.

direction of travel of object: lateral across the horizon towards the south

speed of object: unable to determine without knowing distance. much slower than a passing satellite.

duration of sighting: ten minutes. during that time the object slowly dimmed out and became barely visible to the unaided eye. about a minute later it came on bright again and continued so for several more minutes as it continued to move very slowly to the south.

distance covered: about 15 degrees of a 360 degree circle.

witnesses at my location: five including me.

witnesses at other locations: none. i called a friend in san mateo which is 30 miles to the north, and another person 60 miles to the south during the event. neither person could see the red light. the person 60 miles to the south could easily see jupiter which i used as a nearby reference point (almost the same elevation although jupiter was about 45 degrees to the south of the red light).

tools used: 10-40x60mm binoculars without a tripod. no camera or video.

what i ruled out. mars or any planet. just too bright. aircraft didn't seem likely to me either. i've seen both day and night missile tests before and know how they appear, and this didn't look like a missile on re-entry. when satellites move across the sky their movement is apparent. the red light was barely moving when compared to background stars as seen through binoculars.

possibility: space station and shuttle activity related. the shuttle is currently docked to the station, and according to the sightings page for my area they had just passed that area of the night sky ten minutes prior. however, i have seen the space station pass on numerous past occasions and it's orbit is much much faster than the red light i observed. the proximity and timing are close and i think it's likely related. maybe something was either accidently or intentionally dropped from the space station that burned up on entry with the atmosphere.
content.summary: Red light, almost steady, possibly high altitude or low earth orbit

content.detailedDescription:
On  9 / 06 / 2009, i was in the adirondack mountains, in the back yard of a house  that borders on a small lake known as  sherman lake, in the town of warrensburg.
 
i was gazing up at the sky in an effort to spot a ufo. after about a half hour of looking - at about 2:00 am,
i observed what i thought was simply one among many stars, suddenly begin to move. it moved slowly for about ten seconds, before taking a 45 degree turn and disappearing behind the treetops.
 
on that same night - again at a great height - what appeared as a "cluster" of dim lights that were not as  clear or as bright as the stars were, began moving very slowly. the vaguely lit object or objects had a shape that i could not determine, but it must have been quite large. as it moved, i was trying to contact it with a light from a lantern that i kept turning on an off. the sighting itself kept appearing and disappearing, as if it were turning it's own lights on and of, and it finally dawned upon me that it may have been responding to my signals.
 
when this thought enterred my head, what impressed me was it's extreme "clarity." the thought did not seem to come from me, but instead, seemed to have been placed there. 

i don't recall exactly how i lost sight of  this object.

i hesitate to tell this story to anyone because, when i do, i get the feeling that they think i'm a nut. the fact is, that i would guess that in about 30% to 40% of the times that i go the adirondacks, i see what
appears to be a legitimate extraterrestrial sighting.

my wife didn't believe me until, one night i called her out and she saw for herself.  
 
i believe that these were both ufo sightings.? please send me your opinions.
 
i will follow this e-mail up with descriptions of other sightings that i  
experienced - most of them in the adirondacks. i have never experienced a sighting on long island, howwever, which is where my home is.
 

mike
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw two things in the night sky in the  adirondacks. one appeared star like, the other appeared as a dim "cluster" of lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 10.30pm walking to my van parked at rear of house ( no lighting)
look across sky to see if cloudy or clear approx west coast see 3 red lights forming a triangle. as i looked closer and focused i noticed they were in fact each point of the triangle 3 smaller triangles of red light's. beliving that my eyes were still ajusting to the dark i watied and watched the bottom left hand triangle moved up and around to the top triangle and then moved to the bottom triangl. the top triangle then moved down and around both triangles and returned to the same postion.They then began to move at speed around each other for about 20 / 30 seconds untill they settaled back into the same postion as i had first seen them. they red lighs then begane to pulsate and grow brighter and suddenly they disapered. i mention this to my son and his friend a week later but asked them not to tell any one. then last night i was walking back to my van again and noticed a line of 3 red lights from left to right but looking like they were one thing. i then noticed a small set of red lights with a green light moving around the red lights . the second set of lights with the green light i recognised as an aircraft but it appeared to be cicleing the other lights that did not appear to move.
i called my son out telling him to tell me what he could see and he said he could see the 3 lights togethher as part of 1 thing but what was the plane doing there? the plane begane to move away and head back acroos to france as the plane took about 90 seconds to move to just above our postion the other lights disapered and reappeard in front of the plane and to the north travelling a distance of at least 10 miles in 1 second.
stayed for about 10 to 15 seconds and dissapeard.
i know this might sound stupid but the thing that me and my son found strange was the fact that our airport closes at 9.Pm unless for a seriouse medical emergency and we know the area we notice the lights in was french airforce air space. the plane was also flying over channel island airspace, but directly over the island and about 5 to 10,000 ft this does not happen ....Ever. 
i have decided to tell you this as my son has posted that we had seen something on facebook and one of his friends commented that people reported seeing strange lights in august in guernsey. some have reported chinnese lanterns but they were to far away and sorry but dont move at that speed.
content.summary: 3 seperate small triangle lighs making 1 large triangle. red in colour
content.locationName: St peter port guernsey, St Peter Port

content.detailedDescription: I was milking cows and went to look at a coyote that a friend shot this evening. his son said what the hell is that! we looked up in the sky and there was a bright object that was about the size, shape, and traveled the same path of the space station. there was a light or aura that extended from the object in the shape as best described a nike swoosh that beemed out from the north side of the obect to the front of it. the aura traveled perfectly in sync with the object. there were five of us that saw it. this object never moved rapidly and traveled at the same speed until it disapaited into the eastern sky.
content.summary: Bright light, j shaped (nike swoosh shape) light beaming from the north side of the obect out and to the east in front of the object

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking the dog at the same time i do every night. i happened to look up to see 2 bright lights in a line with a dark narrow object in between, it was very hard to see and very thin aprox 250' in length. i watched it for 2 or 3 minutes as it crossed the river from illinois into iowa then overhead. it stayed on the same path which would be sw to ne. the thing that caught my eye was there were no strobe lights or red and green nav lights,  only bright white lights at the front and back. it was maybe at 1000 ft. and made absolutely no noise. as it moved the tailing light would move to the right 20 degrees back to center for awhile and move 20 degrees to the left. it left my sight at a high rate of speed as it moved up and over the hill to my northeast. when it was overhead it made me a little apprehensive and the dog acted a little strange wanting to head towards the house up the street.
content.summary: 2 bright lights aprox.250' long first light stationary 2nd moving side to side at times

content.detailedDescription: I went to take the trash out about 8:15 on 9/8/09.  as i turned around from the garbage cans i noticed a very bright light in the sky. i first thought it was a star.  i then saw another bright light directly above it.  they were vertical coming from the west.  the lights were moving together and they looked to be a city block in length from each other.  i said to myself "what the hell is that??!!!"  i went and got my boyfriend.  we both watched it.  it just seemed to move and float right over our backyard and then turned and went to the north.  i couldnt see it any longer because of the trees and house.  i have lived near an airport all my life and never have witness anything like this in my life.  commercial jets have a flashing light, this had none.  this was definately, unidentifiable.
content.summary: Two star like lights moving together paralel.

content.detailedDescription: This time it was only a single moving star like object, last night there were two in unison, i reported this event last night but accidently reported it as happening in august, correction...It happened last night.  but tonight, just a while ago, my boyfriend and i were outside getting on our motorcycle when we spotted just a single moving star like object just to the north of us headed northeast.  it was a dimmer light this time, kind of bluish, no flashes, no sound.  last nights incident gave me a feeling of elation, tonights incident however leaves me feeling moody and unsure.  i wonder if this has any relevence.  thanks for letting me share.
content.summary: Moving star like object spotted over harrisburg...Again

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for the space shuttle to cross the sky according to the human space flight website at 9:41 pm, at about 24 degrees altitude started from the nnw and faded out almost due north.  what was unusual about it was that i could see that there was a cloud or exhaust trail that appeared to be hooked shaped and changing shape.  the plume must have been many hundreds of yards long because the shuttle was a tiny dot and this plume was about 4 degrees wide.  it was beautiful.  i imagine the plume was the result of a burn to change orbit, because the cloud was only visible for about 85% of the sighting and changed shape.  the trail looked almost like a comet tail.  

the iss passed by about one minute later with no plume.  i decided to report this because of all the 'two moving stars that followed each other' sightings reported yesterday across the country, which was in all liklihood, the space shuttle followed by the iss.  check out this website for current sighting info on the space station and shuttle.  

http://spaceflight1.Nasa.Gov/realdata/sightings
  
the shuttle and the iss appear as rather bright stars, brighter than jupiter,  and if the angle is high enough, the sighting can last several minutes. the objects will appear to travel straight or with a slight arc, moving a bit faster than a passenger jet, but will not have abrupt zig zag movements. this sighting ranks up there with real ufo sightings i have seen due to the beauty and unexpectedness.  fastest cloud i ever saw, over 17,000 mph following the tail end of the shuttle.  keep your eyes to the sky!
content.summary: Space shuttle with hooked shape cloud or exhaust tail- followed by iss.

content.detailedDescription: I zoomed in on one of the pictures and it looks like something is behind the light, wow how awesome! well here is three of the pictures, let me know how to send you all of them because i haven't even looked at all of them yet i just took as many as i could and i'm sending you three pictures at random.
content.summary: All the same as the last two nights but it was higher and went right over ulysses right after dark

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at exactly 8:05 to see if i could view the iss but its trajectory was too low from my vantage point. while looking up in the sky i noticed 2 bright spherical objects that were orange white in color appear out of the south. the 2 objects were traveling on a south to north direction my guess is they were around 10,000 feet or so in altitude and had the same brightness as jupiter. i went inside and had my wife and son come outside and they witnessed the same objects. i had witnessed this same phenomenon last week at 5 am while viewing venus in the morning except there was only 1 and it was heading west to east and was brighter than venus.
content.summary: 2 lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dog in demarest nj  (wakelee field), i looked up and saw what at first looked to be a very bright star. as i stopped to watch, i noticed that it was moving very very slow, in a northwesterly direction, as i continued to observe the object, another object flew directly behind it, and directly overhead. on the same course as the first object. 
as i stated in the short description, both objects were extremely bright and looked like extremely bright stars; except alot larger and much closer. 
the conditions were partly cloudy, and the height of the clouds was approximately 3600 - 5500 feet above sea level according to the weather station that i logged into. these 2 objects were flying below the cloud coverage, and directly overhead, and made absolutely no sound at all. 
i know this is a busy airspace, as planes are constantly flying into stewart airport, and going to newark airport. 
i can say without a doubt that these were not aircraft, nor were they helicopters. 
the sighting lasted from 20:11 to 20:13. when i noticed the first object i looked at the time, and when the second object disappeared behind the trees, the time was 20:13.
content.summary: While looking up saw extremely bright light followed by another bright light
